entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
